headline: BD Appoints Bilal Muhsin as Executive Vice President and President of Future Connected Care Segment
summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, today announced that, effective July 2, Bilal Muhsin has been named executive vice president and will become the president of BD's future Connected Care segment, as part of the company's previously announced plans to update its structure as it advances its New BD strategy. Mushin will serve as a member of the BD Executive Leadership Team reporting to Tom Polen, chairman, CEO and president of BD and will
